name: Target Training
description:
Smash the most targets in 60 seconds.

10 levels with different objects.

Gamepad Controls

  • Move - Joystick or D-pad
  • Attack - X or R1
  • Jump - A or Y
  • Special Attack - B
  • Dash - R2 and L2
  • Menu - Start

Keyboard Controls

  • Move - WASD or Arrowkeys
  • Attack - X or Left Click
  • Jump - Space or Z
  • Special Attack - C or Right Click
  • Dash - Shift + WASD or Ctrl + Arrowkeys or V + Arrowkeys
  • Menu - Escape

Press the § key or hold L1, R1 and press select to randomize objects on all stages. This will also reset the score on all stages.

Press the M key to  mute the music.

Music - Another Way CC BY Psykick
